text: Following the exciting reports that Pippa Middleton gave birth to a baby boy, Kate's sister has been seen out and about with a pram for the first time. Per the Daily Mail's royal correspondent, Rebecca English, Pippa allegedly gave birth to a baby boy at approximately 1 : 58 p. m. London time, on October 15, 2018. While a name is yet to be announced, it was revealed that the baby boy weighed in at 8 pounds and 9 ounces. And now, the Daily Mail is reporting that Pippa and her husband, James Matthews, have stepped out for the first time with their newborn baby.
